clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for use as the nutritional supplement

contraindications.disease: The LDLo of calcium lactate pentahydrate following intravenous administration in mouse is 140 mg kg MSDS
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Both components of calcium lactate calcium ion and lactic acid play essential roles in the human body as a skeletal element an energy source respectively F59

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Deferiprone can be decreased when it is combined with Calcium lactate
The therapeutic efficacy of Dobutamine can be decreased when used in combination with Calcium lactate
The serum concentration of Dolutegravir can be decreased when it is combined with Calcium lactate
The serum concentration of Eltrombopag can be decreased when it is combined with Calcium lactate
Calcium lactate can cause a decrease in the absorption of Estramustine resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Calcium lactate is combined with Calcium acetate
Calcium lactate may increase the arrhythmogenic and cardiotoxic activities of Digoxin
